title: Emerald Polki Grand Haaram - The Vanalakshmi Necklace
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases the timeless allure of uncut diamonds (Polki) paired with vibrant green emeralds. Each emerald is meticulously set in a 'kundan' style, surrounded by a halo of shimmering Polki diamonds. The central pendant features a large, pear-shaped emerald, emphasizing the grandeur of the piece. The necklace boasts a seamless blend of traditional Telugu craftsmanship and modern design sensibilities. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, lustrous finish.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Vivaham)
or other traditional South Indian ceremonies. Also suitable for high-end formal events where you want to make a statement.
description: This Vanalakshmi Haaram is a testament to the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry making. The combination of natural emeralds and uncut diamonds is both luxurious and auspicious. The Hyderabadi craftsmanship ensures lasting quality and timeless appeal. Investing in this piece means owning a valuable heirloom that can be cherished for generations. The unique color combination and design make it a true conversation starter.
